title: SOLD: T206 SL Lafitte Stamp Back (F. Scott Fitzgerald)......???
author: team-of-rivals

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 SL Lafitte Stamp Back (F. Scott Fitzgerald)......???
posts.post_content:
SOLD
I noticed a little 'fuss' on a couple of recent threads that brought up the subject of the 'FSF' stamp. I don't put any stock into the story/myth but apparently some do. That being said, I'm taking offers on this 'unicorn.' It appears to be stamped two or three times, smudged, etc. Back is ugly, front presents well. PM with interest. Thanks for looking and keep the b.s. stories coming!
I have interest! lmk whats your highest offer:)
